.ccl-logo-banner {
  flex-wrap: wrap; }
  .ccl-logo-banner img {
    height: 180px; }
  .ccl-logo-banner .c19-text-banner {
    color: white;
    font-size: 3rem;
    max-width: 28rem;
    font-weight: 900;
    line-height: 3.5rem;
    margin-left: 2rem; }
    @media (max-width: 840px) {
      .ccl-logo-banner .c19-text-banner {
        font-size: 2.3rem;
        line-height: 3rem;
        max-width: 22rem; } }
    @media (max-width: 730px) {
      .ccl-logo-banner .c19-text-banner {
        max-width: 100%; } }
    .ccl-logo-banner .c19-text-banner:after {
      content: "";
      display: inline-block;
      background-image: url(/themes/custom/copernicus/assets/images/c19/arrow.svg);
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: center right;
      background-size: contain;
      height: 2.2rem;
      width: 5rem;
      margin-left: 2rem;
      margin-bottom: -0.3rem; }
      @media (max-width: 840px) {
        .ccl-logo-banner .c19-text-banner:after {
          margin-bottom: -0.5rem; } }

  min-height: 80px;
  height: 80px !important; }

  max-width: 560px;
  margin: auto; }

  position: relative;
  height: 0;
  padding-bottom: 56.25%; }

  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%; }

.intro #intro .emb,
.c19-blog-view {
  margin-top: 2rem; }
  .intro #intro .emb .field-content,
  .c19-blog-view .field-content {
    display: flex; }
    @media (max-width: 1199px) {
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content {
        flex-flow: column; } }
    .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-left,
    .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-left {
      display: flex;
      flex-flow: column;
      margin-right: 3rem; }
      @media (max-width: 1199px) {
        .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-left,
        .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-left {
          margin: auto; } }
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-image,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-image {
        overflow: hidden;
        width: 225px;
        height: 225px;
        border-radius: 113px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-bottom: 1rem; }
        .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-image img,
        .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-image img {
          height: 100% !important;
          width: auto !important;
          max-width: inherit !important;
          margin-left: -50%;
          margin-right: -50%; }
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-name,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-name {
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600; }
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-role,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-left .blog-eus-role {
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.9rem; }
    .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-right,
    .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-right {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      margin-right: 20%; }
      @media (max-width: 992px) {
        .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-right,
        .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-right {
          margin-right: auto; } }
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-logo,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-logo {
        margin-top: 1.4rem; }
        .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-logo img,
        .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-logo img {
          width: auto !important;
          height: 55px !important; }
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-signature,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-signature {
        text-align: right;
        margin-right: 3rem; }
      .intro #intro .emb .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-body,
      .c19-blog-view .field-content .block-blog-right .blog-eus-body {
        position: relative;
        				                   			/*	&amp;:before {
        									position: absolute;
        									content: "
        10d";
        									color: #ffd617;
        									left: -1.5rem;
        									top: 0.625rem;
        									font-size: 1.25rem;
        									display: block;
        									font-weight: 900;
        									font-family: Font Awesome\ 5 Free;

        									content: "
        10e";

article.c19-eus-action {
  display: flex;
  margin-bottom: 4rem; }
  @media (max-width: 992px) {
    article.c19-eus-action {
      flex-wrap: wrap; } }
  article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text {
    width: 50%; }
    @media (max-width: 992px) {
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text {
        width: 100%;
        order: 3; } }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text {
        margin-top: 1.5rem; } }
    article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text h4 {
      margin-top: 0.5rem;
      margin-bottom: 1rem; }
    article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text .c19-readmore-block .field-group-wrapper {
      background-color: #f8f8f8;
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
      padding: 0.5rem 2rem;
      /*.c19-url{
      	padding: 0.1rem 0.2rem;
      	&amp;:hover{
      		background-color: white;
      	}
      }*/ }
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text .c19-readmore-block .field-group-wrapper p {
        font-size: 0.9rem; }
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text .c19-readmore-block .field-group-wrapper p.text-muted + p {
        margin-top: 0; }
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-text .c19-readmore-block .field-group-wrapper a:hover {
        text-decoration: underline;
        color: #003399; }
  article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-agency {
    margin-left: 1.5rem;
    margin-right: 2.5rem;
    width: 11rem; }
    @media (max-width: 992px) {
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-agency {
        width: 11rem;
        margin-right: 0;
        order: 2; } }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-agency {
        width: 100%;
        order: 2;
        margin-left: 0;
        margin-right: 0;
        height: 3.5rem;
        text-align: right;
        margin-top: -3.5rem; }
        article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-agency div {
          background-color: white;
          text-align: right;
          width: 11rem;
          margin-left: auto;
          margin-right: 0; } }
    article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-agency img {
      width: 100%;
      height: auto; }
      @media (max-width: 768px) {
        article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-agency img {
          width: 11rem; } }
  article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-image {
    width: calc(50% - 12.5rem); }
    @media (max-width: 992px) {
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-image {
        width: calc(100% - 15rem);
        order: 1; } }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-image {
        width: 100%;
        order: 1; } }
    article.c19-eus-action .c19-eus-action-image img {
      width: 100%;
      height: auto; }

.c19-btn-readmore {
  color: #000;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  text-align: right;
  padding-right: 4rem; }
  .c19-btn-readmore a,
  .c19-btn-readmore a:hover {
    color: #000;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-style: italic;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    position: relative; }
    .c19-btn-readmore a:before,
    .c19-btn-readmore a:hover:before {
      position: absolute;
      content: "-";
      font-style: normal;
      font-weight: bold;
      display: block;
      top: 0px;
      left: -1.1rem;
      font-size: 1.5rem;
      line-height: 1rem; }
    .c19-btn-readmore a:after,
    .c19-btn-readmore a:hover:after {
      content: "Hide"; }

.collapsed .c19-btn-readmore a:before {
  content: "+"; }
.collapsed .c19-btn-readmore a:after {
  content: "Read more"; }

.c19-view-more-btn {
  position: relative;
  background-color: #003399;
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; }
  .c19-view-more-btn:hover {
    background-color: #273B4B; }
  .c19-view-more-btn a {
    color: white !important;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 1rem;
    line-height: 1.25rem; }
    .c19-view-more-btn a:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      display: block; }
    .c19-view-more-btn a span:after {
      margin-left: 1rem;
      content: "\f054";
      font-size: 1.25rem;
      line-height: 1.25rem;
      display: inline-block;
      font-weight: 900;
      font-family: Font Awesome\ 5 Free; }

      padding-right: 1rem; } }

    background-color: #273B4B; }

    display: block;

    background-size: contain;
    content: "";

    width: 5rem;
    height: calc(0.67 * 5rem);
    left: 1rem;
    top: calc(50% - (0.67 * 2.5rem));
    position: absolute; }

    color: white !important;

    display: block;
    max-width: 640px;
    line-height: 2rem; }

      content: "";

      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      display: block; }

.c19-help {
  margin: 4rem auto 2rem 0;
  max-width: 750px; }

.c19-help-blocks {
  display: flex; }
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    .c19-help-blocks {
      flex-flow: column; } }
  .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block {
    margin-left: 2rem;
    width: calc((100% - 4rem) / 3);
    background-color: #003399;
    position: relative;
    transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block {
        width: 60%;
        margin-left: 20% !important;
        margin-right: 20% !important;
        margin-bottom: 2rem; } }
    @media (max-width: 640px) {
      .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block {
        width: 80%;
        margin-left: 10% !important;
        margin-right: 10% !important;
        margin-bottom: 2rem; } }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block:hover {
      background-color: #273B4B; }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block .c19-help-block-content {
      position: absolute;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      text-align: center;
      display: flex;
      flex-flow: column;
      justify-content: center; }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-1 img {
      width: 50% !important;
      margin-right: auto;
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-bottom: 2rem; }
      @media (min-width: 640px) and (max-width: 992px) {
        .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-1 img {
          margin-bottom: 1rem; } }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-2 img.c19-help-ec {
      width: 70% !important;
      margin-right: auto;
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-bottom: 2rem; }
      @media (min-width: 640px) and (max-width: 992px) {
        .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-2 img.c19-help-ec {
          margin-bottom: 1rem; } }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-2 img.c19-help-esa {
      width: 40% !important;
      margin-right: auto;
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-top: 2rem; }
      @media (min-width: 640px) and (max-width: 992px) {
        .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-2 img.c19-help-esa {
          margin-top: 1rem; } }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-3 img {
      width: 25% !important;
      margin-right: auto;
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-bottom: 2rem; }
      @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 992px) {
        .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block.c19-help-block-3 img {
          margin-bottom: 1rem; } }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block:first-child {
      margin-left: 0; }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block:after {
      content: "";
      display: block;
      padding-bottom: 100%; }
    .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block a {
      color: white !important;
      font-size: 1.5rem;
      margin-left: 2rem;
      display: block;
      margin-right: 2rem; }
      @media (min-width: 992px) and (max-width: 1199px) {
        .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block a {
          font-size: 1.2rem; } }
      @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 992px) {
        .c19-help-blocks .c19-help-block a {
          font-size: 1rem;
          line-height: 1.2;
          margin-left: 0.5rem;
          margin-right: 0.5rem; } }

        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        display: block; }

    background-color: #f8f8f8; }
